summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a contractor, confirming that PAE will make a new copy of a 1.2 million document production onto a drive for the defense, and requesting coordination for delivery.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating the copying and delivery of a large document production for the defense in the Epstein case.

events.title: Coordination for Document Copying
events.description: An AUSA confirms that PAE will make a new copy of a 1.2 million document production for the defense and requests coordination for delivery.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 17, 2020, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
It concerns the copying of a massive 1.2 million document production related to the Epstein case.
The copy is being made for the defense, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The physical delivery location is 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, the address for the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The contractor PAE is handling the technical copying and transfer of the documents.
